capability.name: Channel Portfolio
capability.definition: Evaluate the coverage and relative performance of different channels with respect to the blend of service and product activity. Optimize channel use to minimize costs and enhance customer experience
capability.role: Evaluate the coverage and relative performance of different channels with respect to the blend of service and product activity. Optimize channel use to minimize costs and enhance customer experience
capability.example: Product designers review the performance of products over different channels and channel combinations to refine product designs and delivery

key_features.name: Channel coverage evaluation
key_features.description: Enables channel coverage evaluation to support evaluate the coverage and relative performance of different channels with respect to the blend of service and product activity

key_features.name: Performance analysis across different channels
key_features.description: Enables performance analysis across different channels to support evaluate the coverage and relative performance of different channels with respect to the blend of service and product activity

key_features.name: Channel optimization for cost minimization
key_features.description: Enables channel optimization for cost minimization to support evaluate the coverage and relative performance of different channels with respect to the blend of service and product activity

key_features.name: Customer experience enhancement through channel optimization
key_features.description: Enables customer experience enhancement through channel optimization to support evaluate the coverage and relative performance of different channels with respect to the blend of service and product activity
